segments.text: The acting of this film is marvelous.In spite of the thin plot , the acting , the music and the scene have won the Academy Award of this year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry for hero . I dont think there's any excuse for his acting in some parts .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't be too critical.We can't expect it to be perfect .
segments.speaker: S1
